specs.title: DVD Cloner Specifications
specs.content:
Editor's Note: This information was taken directly from the DVD Cloner website.

Features:

 Perfect 1:1 DVD copy

  • The all-round upgraded HST™ technology can decrypt all the DVD protections for you to bring the cinema home.
  • The optimized reading speed makes the DVD copying a great deal faster and more stable.
  • The fire-new one-click interface makes DVD copy as handy as a pocket in a shirt.
  • Exact DVD-5 to DVD-5 copy
  • Exact DVD-9 to DVD-9 copy

 Customized Copy

  • Combines two DVD movies to one DVD±R/RW DL with customized menu.
  • Combines multiple DVDs to one BD-R/RE.
  • Automatically removes the annoying contents such as legal and advertising clips.
  • Movie only copy - copies and burns the main title only with the extras omitted.
  • Compresses one DVD-9 movie to DVD-5 with incomparable image quality.
  • Supports for reading the movies of DVD format from hard disk.

OET™ - Copy latest DVD movies

  • The inventive OET™ allows you to copy latest DVD movies through the optimized core.

Other Features

  • Copies the scratched DVD discs.
  • Supports for multi-core CPUs and makes the DVD copying speed far higher.
  • Downloads and captures online movies from the Internet with the free bonus Stream-Cloner Lite.
  • Get the free bonus Open DVD ripper Lite, making it possible to convert DVD movies to AVI, MPEG and SVCD formats.
  • Automatically identifies the source movie and the target burner after it is put into the drive.
  • Provides the function to shut down the computer automatically when the copy is finished.
  • Displays the wizard titles on the Expert interface.
  • Controls the DVD reading speed to get less noise when watching DVD movies.
  • Supports most DVD burners such as Samsung, Pioneer, LG, Sony, BenQ and so on.
  • Defines a temporary directory for saving DVD movies.
  • Sets the bad sector skipping value.
  • Supports multiple languages such as English, French, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, Dutch, Italian, Arabic, etc to meet the needs of customers from different countries.
  • Compatible with Windows 8, 7, Vista, XP and 2000.

System requirements:

  • Pentium-II 450 MHz or faster processor
  • 64MB of RAM
  • 5GB free hard disc space for DVD-5 (10GB free hard disc space for DVD-9)
  • DVD burners
  • Windows 7, Vista, XP, 2000

For Blu-ray/HD DVD copying:

  • NTFS partition
  • A Blu-Ray disk drive
  • A Blu-Ray media player
  • 50GB or more free disc space for Blu-Ray copying.

DVD-Cloner 2015 is the up-to-the-minute generation of the top DVD copy software worldwide. Its flexible functions and the most advanced technology bring you a brand-new DVD/Blu-ray copying experience.
